titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Library Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Tonko moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 336.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 4/22/2009--Passed House without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of National Library Week (April 12-18, 2009).
